name: Army Corps of Hell
description:
Army Corps of Hell brings a new level of vicious combat, dark humor and lightning-quick action to the PlayStation®Vita handheld entertainment system. As the King of Hell you control an army of a hundred goblin soldiers with various classes and abilities to defeat a host of enemies in order to reclaim your throne. Take full advantage of the unique control features of the PlayStation Vita to experience war like never before!



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
